TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GZipStream extends System.IO.Stream

summary.span: 提供用於壓縮和解壓縮資料流的方法和屬性。

span.span: Provides methods and properties used to compress and decompress streams.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此類別代表會使用業界標準演算法的不失真的檔案壓縮和解壓縮 gzip 資料格式。This class represents the gzip data format, which uses an industry-standard algorithm for lossless file compression and decompression. 該格式包含用於偵測資料損毀的循環冗餘檢查值。The format includes a cyclic redundancy check value for detecting data corruption. Gzip 資料格式會使用相同的演算法為類別，但可以延伸到使用其他壓縮格式。The gzip data format uses the same algorithm as the class, but can be extended to use other compression formats. 未涵蓋的專利的方式，可以輕易地實作格式。The format can be readily implemented in a manner not covered by patents. 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，則類別會使用壓縮的 zlib 程式庫。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the class uses the zlib library for compression. 如此一來，它提供更好的壓縮演算法，而且在大部分情況下，比起較小的壓縮的檔提供在舊版的.NET Framework。As a result, it provides a better compression algorithm and, in most cases, a smaller compressed file than it provides in earlier versions of the .NET Framework. 壓縮可以使用許多常用的壓縮工具解壓縮至副檔名為.gz 檔案寫入的物件; 不過，此類別不本質上提供的功能新增至檔案，或從 zip 封存解壓縮檔案。Compressed objects written to a file with an extension of .gz can be decompressed using many common compression tools; however, this class does not inherently provide functionality for adding files to or extracting files from zip archives. 中的壓縮功能和公開為資料流。The compression functionality in and is exposed as a stream. 資料是讀取位元組的基礎，因此無法執行多次傳遞才能判斷壓縮整個檔案或大型資料區塊的最佳方法。Data is read on a byte-by-byte basis, so it is not possible to perform multiple passes to determine the best method for compressing entire files or large blocks of data. 和類別最適合使用未壓縮的資料來源上。The and classes are best used on uncompressed sources of data. 如果已經壓縮的來源資料，使用這些類別可能會增加資料流的大小。If the source data is already compressed, using these classes may actually increase the size of the stream. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用類別壓縮和解壓縮檔案的目錄。The following example shows how to use the class to compress and decompress a directory of files. [!code-csharp[IO.Compression.GZip1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.Compression.GZip1/CS/gziptest.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IO.Compression.GZip1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.Compression.GZip1/VB/gziptest.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the specified stream and compression level.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您想要指定是否壓縮效率和速度會更重要的執行個體時，會使用這個建構函式類別。You use this constructor when you want to specify whether compression efficiency or speed is more important for an instance of the class. 這個建構函式多載會使用壓縮模式。This constructor overload uses the compression mode . 若要將壓縮模式設定為另一個值，使用或多載。To set the compression mode to another value, use the or overload. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立時設定壓縮層級物件。The following example shows how to set the compression level when creating a object. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.GZipStream#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.gzipstream/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.GZipStream#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.gzipstream/vb/program1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用指定的資料流和壓縮模式，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the specified stream and compression mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，擁有基礎資料流，因此關閉`stream`參數也會關閉基礎資料流。By default, owns the underlying stream, so closing the `stream` parameter also closes the underlying stream. 請注意，基礎資料流的狀態可能會影響資料流的可用性。Note that the state of the underlying stream can affect the usability of the stream. 此外，任何明確的檢查會不執行，所以會建立新的執行個體時，會擲不回任何其他的例外狀況。Also, no explicit checks are performed, so no additional exceptions are thrown when the new instance is created. 如果執行個體類別會透過`mode`參數等於`Compress`和未發生任何進一步的動作、 資料流將會顯示為有效的、 空的壓縮檔。If an instance of the class is created with the `mode` parameter equal to `Compress` and no further action occurs, the stream will appear as a valid, empty compressed file. 根據預設，壓縮層級設定為壓縮模式時。By default, the compression level is set to when the compression mode is . ## Examples 下列範例會初始化的新執行個體類別搭配`mode`設定為。The following example initializes a new instance of the class with `mode` set to . 這個範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[IO.Compression.GZip1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.Compression.GZip1/CS/gziptest.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IO.Compression.GZip1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.Compression.GZip1/VB/gziptest.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您想要指定是否壓縮效率和速度會更重要的執行個體時，會使用這個建構函式類別，以及是否要在處置之後，將資料流物件保持開啟物件。You use this constructor when you want to specify whether compression efficiency or speed is more important for an instance of the class, and whether to leave the stream object open after disposing the object. 這個建構函式多載會使用壓縮模式。This constructor overload uses the compression mode . 若要將壓縮模式設定為另一個值，使用或多載。To set the compression mode to another value, use the or overload. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立時設定壓縮層級物件，以及如何將資料流保持開啟。The following example shows how to set the compression level when creating a object and how to leave the stream open. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.GZipStream#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.gzipstream/cs/program2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.GZipStream#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.gzipstream/vb/program2.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，擁有基礎資料流，因此關閉`stream`參數也會關閉基礎資料流。By default, owns the underlying stream, so closing the `stream` parameter also closes the underlying stream. 請注意，基礎資料流的狀態可能會影響資料流的可用性。Note that the state of the underlying stream can affect the usability of the stream. 此外，任何明確的檢查會不執行，所以會建立新的執行個體時，會擲不回任何其他的例外狀況。Also, no explicit checks are performed, so no additional exceptions are thrown when the new instance is created. 如果執行個體類別會透過`mode`參數等於`Compress`和未發生任何進一步的動作、 資料流將會顯示為有效的、 空的壓縮檔。If an instance of the class is created with the `mode` parameter equal to `Compress` and no further action occurs, the stream will appear as a valid, empty compressed file. 根據預設，壓縮層級設定為壓縮模式時。By default, the compression level is set to when the compression mode is .

summary.span: (請考慮使用 方法替代。)

returns.span: 物件，表示可能還在暫止中的非同步讀取作業。

span.span: An object that represents the asynchronous read operation, which could still be pending.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，您可以使用來執行非同步讀取的作業方法。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you can perform asynchronous read operations by using the method. 方法是中仍然可用[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]以支援舊版的程式碼; 不過，您可以實作非同步 I/O 作業更輕鬆地使用新的非同步方法。The method is still available in [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] to support legacy code; however, you can implement asynchronous I/O operations more easily by using the new async methods. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information, see . 傳遞傳回值以方法來判斷多少位元組被讀取，並釋放用於讀取的作業系統資源的資料流。Pass the return value to the method of the stream to determine how many bytes were read and to release operating system resources used for reading. 您可以藉由使用相同的程式碼呼叫或在傳遞至回呼。You can do this either by using the same code that called or in a callback passed to . 非同步讀取或寫入發出時，不在 I/O 作業完成時，會更新資料流中目前的位置。The current position in the stream is updated when the asynchronous read or write is issued, not when the I/O operation completes. 多個同時的非同步要求轉譯要求完成順序不確定。Multiple simultaneous asynchronous requests render the request completion order uncertain. 使用屬性來判斷是否目前物件支援讀取。Use the property to determine whether the current object supports reading. 如果資料流已關閉，或您傳遞無效的引數，會擲回例外狀況立即從。If a stream is closed or you pass an invalid argument, exceptions are thrown immediately from . 非同步的讀取要求時，例如磁碟失敗期間，在 I/O 要求期間發生的錯誤會發生在執行緒集區執行緒和呼叫時擲回例外狀況。Errors that occur during an asynchronous read request, such as a disk failure during the I/O request, occur on the thread pool thread and throw exceptions when calling . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別壓縮和解壓縮檔案。The following code example shows how to use the class to compress and decompress a file. [!code-csharp[IO.Compression.GZip1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.Compression.GZip1/CS/gziptest.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IO.Compression.GZip1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.Compression.GZip1/VB/gziptest.vb#1)]

exception.span: 嘗試非同步讀取的方法超越資料流結尾，或發生了磁碟錯誤。

span.span: The method tried to read asynchronously past the end of the stream, or a disk error occurred.
One or more of the arguments is invalid.

exception.span: 關閉資料流後呼叫了方法。

span.span: Methods were called after the stream was closed.

exception.span: 目前的 實作不支援讀取作業。

span.span: The current implementation does not support the read operation.

exception.span: 無法執行讀取作業，因為資料流已關閉。

span.span: A read operation cannot be performed because the stream is closed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，您可以使用來執行非同步寫入作業方法。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you can perform asynchronous write operations by using the method. 方法是中仍然可用[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]以支援舊版的程式碼; 不過，您可以實作非同步 I/O 作業更輕鬆地使用新的非同步方法。The method is still available in [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] to support legacy code; however, you can implement asynchronous I/O operations more easily by using the new async methods. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information, see . 方法會啟動的非同步寫入作業資料流物件。The method starts an asynchronous write operation to a stream object. 您必須建立回呼方法可實作委派，並將其名稱來傳遞方法。You must create a callback method that implements the delegate and pass its name to the method.

span.span: The underlying stream is .

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用方法和方法。This method is called by the public method and the method. 叫用受保護方法`disposing`參數設為`true`。 invokes the protected method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用具有`disposing`設定為`false`。 invokes with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 方法。This method invokes the method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以多次呼叫的其他物件。覆寫 時，請小心不要參考到先前已在對 的早期呼叫中被處置 (Dispose) 的物件。如需有關如何實作，請參閱 [實作 Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。如需詳細資訊和，請參閱 [總未受管理的 Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) 清除。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，您可以使用來執行非同步讀取的作業方法。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you can perform asynchronous read operations by using the method. 方法是中仍然可用[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]以支援舊版的程式碼; 不過，您可以實作非同步 I/O 作業更輕鬆地使用新的非同步方法。The method is still available in [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] to support legacy code; however, you can implement asynchronous I/O operations more easily by using the new async methods. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information, see . 呼叫這個方法來判斷資料流中讀取多少個位元組。Call this method to determine how many bytes were read from the stream. 可以一次呼叫這個方法，來傳回呼叫之間所讀取的位元組數量和。This method can be called once to return the amount of bytes read between calls to and . 這個方法會封鎖，直到 I/O 作業完成為止。This method blocks until the I/O operation has completed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別壓縮和解壓縮檔案。The following code example shows how to use the class to compress and decompress a file. [!code-csharp[IO.Compression.GZip1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.Compression.GZip1/CS/gziptest.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IO.Compression.GZip1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.Compression.GZip1/VB/gziptest.vb#1)]

span.span: If the end of the stream has been reached, zero or the number of bytes read is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果資料位於格式無效，做為其中一個最後的作業就會擲回。If data is found in an invalid format, an is thrown as one of the last operations. 循環冗餘檢查 (CRC) 是以這個方法的最後一個作業的其中一個執行。A cyclic redundancy check (CRC) is performed as one of the last operations of this method. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何壓縮和解壓縮位元組，使用和方法。The following example shows how to compress and decompress bytes by using the and methods. remarks.format: ## Remarks 寫入作業可能會立即發生，但經過緩衝處理，直到達到緩衝區大小，或直到或呼叫方法。The write operation might not occur immediately but is buffered until the buffer size is reached or until the or method is called. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何壓縮和解壓縮位元組，使用和方法。The following example shows how to compress and decompress bytes by using the and methods. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.GZipStream#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.gzipstream/cs/program3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.GZipStream#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.gzipstream/vb/program3.vb#3)]

exception.span: 無法執行寫入作業，因為資料流已關閉。

span.span: The write operation cannot be performed because the stream is closed.
